name: Serpent
description: Serpent is a growth and creative platform on Solana. We're supporting projects with branding, design and community-building while also creating entry points for creators and designers to contribute. Our native token, SPT, powers payments, bounties and rewards. This dual focus strengthens trust, improves visibility and drives adoption for both builders and contributors. Beyond delivering creative services, Serpent provides the infrastructure for meaningful collaboration between projects and creators, ensuring that innovation is supported with professional execution and long-term sustainability across the ecosystem.
